definition: wine and women/color of wine/drunken expression
wine, sex, avarice and temper (idiom); four cardinal vices
follower of wine and women/dissolute person

sentences.english: Yeah, When I get to the top of a mountain, I feel so satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 嗯酒色，免肉爬到凡顶，总会衣一种满系感。

sentences.english: An excellent medium pale sstaw colour with lemon green tints .
sentences.chinese: 酒色带有一种极好的中度亮黄色带有柠檬绿的光晕。

sentences.english: Wine and wenches empty men's purses.
MUSIC festivals are typically a great excuse for revellers to enjoy a bit of drunken debauchery.
sentences.chinese: 音乐节日通常是狂欢者沉湎酒色的主要理由。

sentences.english: This wine shines ruby-red in the glass, with purple reflections.
sentences.chinese: 红宝石般的酒色边缘带着几分紫色的活力。

sentences.english: Bright white straw with a green tint.
sentences.chinese: 酒色明亮，淡麦杆色略带一丝青绿。

sentences.english: In the flat oval shields there were carbuncles, both wine-coloured and coloured like grass.
sentences.chinese: 扁平的椭圆盾牌上堆着红玉，有红酒色和草色的。

sentences.english: An adventurous voluptuary, angling in all streams for variety of pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 一个冒险的酒色之徒，涉猎于各种享乐之中。

sentences.english: The color is medium yellow with touches of grapey green.
sentences.chinese: 酒色偏黄而略带轻微的葡萄绿色泽。

sentences.english: The product has a good flavor and a nice taste with the combined flavor of wine and medlar fruits.
sentences.chinese: 成品酒色纯正，口感醇厚，酒香和枸杞果香融为一体。

sentences.english: Cherry red in colour with purple glance.
sentences.chinese: 樱红的酒色中带有深紫色的反光。

sentences.english: Wine, women, and song looked more attractive than plowing his father's fields.
sentences.chinese: 比起耕种父亲的田地，酒色笙歌当然吸引得多。

the contents of the cup/(fig.) liquor/wine
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
